channel.title: Telemak Showreel
channel.itunes:author: Telemak
channel.description: Telemak is a European based streaming facilitator. We provide the entire workflow for companies and institutions that wish to bring video and audio to new delivery channels such as the internet, mobile TV or Interactive Television.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Telemak is a European based streaming facilitator. We provide the entire workflow for companies and institutions that wish to bring video and audio to new delivery channels such as the internet, mobile TV or Interactive Television

item.title: The Scherpenberg mill in Westmalle
item.itunes:author: Telemak
item.description: The Scherpenberg mill is a windmill of the tower mill type and is located in Westmalle, Belgium. It is still operational and it grinds grain every Sunday from 1:30 pm until 5 pm.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Scherpenberg mill is a windmill of the tower mill type and is located in Westmalle, Belgium. It is still operational and it grinds grain every Sunday from 1:30 pm until 5 pm.

item.title: Air to Air Academy
item.itunes:author: Telemak
item.description: The first edition of the Air-to-Air Academy took place from 13-16 May 2010 at Zoersel airfield and was already a huge success. No less then 80 photographers from 21 different countries had the chance to fly with us and experience the thrill of this unique form of aviation photography. The preparations for the second edition in 2011 are already taking place, so please check this page for the latest news of the next edition of the Air-to-Air Academy.
item.itunes:subtitle: The first edition of the Air-to-Air Academy took place from 13-16 May 2010 at Zoersel airfield and was already a huge success.
item.itunes:summary: The first edition of the Air-to-Air Academy took place from 13-16 May 2010 at Zoersel airfield and was already a huge success. No less then 80 photographers from 21 different countries had the chance to fly with us and experience the thrill of this unique form of aviation photography. The preparations for the second edition in 2011 are already taking place, so please check this page for the latest news of the next edition of the Air-to-Air Academy.

item.title: Osirix
item.itunes:author: Telemak
item.description: OsiriX is an image processing software dedicated to DICOM images produced by imaging equipment (MRI, CT, PET, PET-CT, SPECT-CT, Ultrasounds, ...). It can also read many other file formats: TIFF (8,16, 32 bits), JPEG, PDF, AVI, MPEG and Quicktime.
item.itunes:subtitle: OsiriX is an image processing software dedicated to DICOM images produced by imaging equipment (MRI, CT, PET, PET-CT, SPECT-CT, Ultrasounds, ...). It can also read many other file formats: TIFF (8,16, 32 bits), JPEG, PDF, AVI, MPEG and Quicktime.
item.itunes:summary: OsiriX is an image processing software dedicated to DICOM images produced by imaging equipment (MRI, CT, PET, PET-CT, SPECT-CT, Ultrasounds, ...). It can also read many other file formats: TIFF (8,16, 32 bits), JPEG, PDF, AVI, MPEG and Quicktime.
